login.title: Login
login.description: Account access is rolling out soon. Login will unlock premium features, longer trip history, and smoother paywall upgrade flows.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: The full FAQ is currently in progress. For now, account activation and anonymous-trip access limits are described on the Pricing page while we prepare the complete help center.
